name: Brown Spot
description: A fungal disease caused by Bipolaris oryzae that affects rice leaves, causing brown spots and reducing yield.

solutions.title: Remove Infected Plants
solutions.description: Remove and destroy severely infected plants to prevent spread

solutions.title: Apply Fungicide
solutions.description: Spray with Propiconazole (0.1%) or Mancozeb (0.2%) at 10-15 day intervals

solutions.title: Improve Field Drainage
solutions.description: Ensure proper water management and avoid waterlogging

solutions.title: Use Resistant Varieties
solutions.description: Plant resistant varieties like IR64, IR72 in next season

name: Blast Disease
description: A devastating fungal disease caused by Magnaporthe oryzae, affecting leaves, nodes, and panicles.

solutions.title: Remove Infected Parts
solutions.description: Cut and burn infected leaves and panicles

solutions.title: Adjust Water Management
solutions.description: Maintain shallow water level (5-7 cm) and avoid drought stress

solutions.title: Post-Harvest Management
solutions.description: Destroy crop residues and practice deep plowing

name: Bacterial Blight
description: Bacterial disease caused by Xanthomonas oryzae pv. oryzae, causing water-soaked lesions on leaves.

solutions.title: Remove Infected Leaves
solutions.description: Prune and destroy infected leaves to reduce inoculum

solutions.title: Water Management
solutions.description: Avoid overhead irrigation and reduce water splashing

solutions.title: Field Sanitation
solutions.description: Remove weeds and maintain clean field borders

prevention: Avoid wounding plants during field operations
Practice crop rotation with non-host crops

name: Sheath Blight
description: Fungal disease caused by Rhizoctonia solani, affecting leaf sheaths and causing lodging.

solutions.title: Reduce Plant Density
solutions.description: Thin out plants if too dense to improve air circulation

solutions.title: Water Management
solutions.description: Drain field for 2-3 days to reduce humidity

solutions.title: Nutrition Management
solutions.description: Reduce nitrogen and increase potassium application
